topic.title: Adding a Logo Image in the Title Area

body.p:
To add a logo in the title area of your WebHelp output, follow this procedure:
Edit a WebHelp transformation scenario, then open the Parameters tab.
Specify the path to your logo in the webhelp.logo.image parameter.
If you also want to add a link to your website when you click the logo image, set the URL in the webhelp.logo.image.target.url parameter.
Run the transformation scenario.
